SELECT * FROM opms_process_design pd left join opms_design_data dd on pd.design_data_id = dd.design_data_id and dd.del_flag = 0
and pd.status = #{query.status} and pd.create_by like concat('%', #{query.createBy}, '%') and dd.lens_left = #{query.lensLeft} and dd.lens_right = #{query.lensRight} and dd.parts_name like concat('%', #{query.partsName}, '%') and dd.parts_type = #{query.partsType}
and date_format(pd.create_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{query.beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(pd.create_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{query.endTime},'%y%m%d')
